newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINVEST REPEATS SEES HIGHER 1997 EARNINGS.
newsitem.headline: FINVEST REPEATS SEES HIGHER 1997 EARNINGS.

text.p: Finnish capacitor and consulting group Finvest Oy said on Tuesday it expected earnings to rise significantly this year compared to 1996, when it posted a 13.0 million markka profit after financial items.

"The summer holiday period will affect Finvest-group's second tertial but full-year 1997 earnings are expected to improve significantly on the previous year," it said in a statement with its January-April report.
It posted January-April profit after financial items at 23.4 million markka, up from 21.0 million in the year-ago period.
